text: Chris Evans and Jenny Slate's relationship was beloved by the internet. Theo Wargo / Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images Chris Evans and Jenny Slate have broken up again, according to the New York Times. Evans and Slate had an on - again, off - again relationship that the internet loved. INSIDER spoke with relationship experts to find out why getting back together with an ex is almost always a bad idea. Once again, Chris Evans and Jenny Slate have broken up, according to a recent New York Times profile of Evans. The profile doesn't go into too much detail as to what caused the breakup.
